articles.content: Through the years, one of the hallmarks of Star Wars is repetition, whether it's Death Stars, catchphrases, family conflicts, or loss - particularly when it comes to an appendage. Another reoccurring… [+3676 chars]

articles.title: TV News: Flash, Equalizer, Guru, Black - Dark Horizons
articles.description: The Flash Rick Cosnett is returning to The CW’s “The Flash”. The actor, who played CCPD Detective Eddie Thawne in the first season and was killed off in the finale, will reprise his role for an arc or at least three episodes. His character is also reportedly …
